uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs

Class DNInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.AbstractInput<V>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.ParseAbstractInput<java.lang.String>
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.DNInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input<java.lang.String>, ItemInput<javax.naming.ldap.LdapName>, LengthInput<java.lang.String>, OptionalInput, ParseInput<java.lang.String>

    public class DNInput
extends ParseAbstractInput<java.lang.String>
implements ItemInput<javax.naming.ldap.LdapName>
    A TextInput to input Globus/LDAP DN names. for historical reasons the canonical String representation is the Globus one though both forms should be accepted as input and the class provides methods to convert between the two forms.
